website_summaries.verdict: Although it can charge more than one device at a time, it comes with a few issues that make it less user-friendly than similar models.
pros: A multi-purpose metal charging  dock that can charge an iPhone, AirPods, and an Apple watch all at once
Easy to use and adjust, and comes in several good-looking colors
Works with some cell phone cases in place
cons: Not compatible with all charging cords
Lightning connector doesn't feel very stable

website_summaries.verdict: Both a functional marvel and a piece of art. If you’ve got all of Apple’s mobile gear, this is one you need.
pros: It comes in colors matched to the iPhone
It charges AirPods while still allowing you to take the battery case with you
cons: You have to use your own cables, and once you’ve connected them to the structure, they’re not meant to be removed very often

customer_reviews.title: It fits and works with the pop socket and case!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this for my wife who has all three , IPhone 8 Plus, AirPods, Apple Watch 4. Where to start with my review?! First off the unit is fully adjustable, it fits with the case and the pop socket on the back attached. The lip to keep the watch from sliding down is an improvement over other designs, the cable management is awesome. Another big plus. It all comes apart an stores flat for travel. (Unlike other designs) Reassembly is very easy, My wife loves this product. Now I will order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: micki madison

customer_reviews.title: Good product- make sure the phone is connected
customer_reviews.text: This stand is awesome! I wanted something to eliminate all of the cords everywhere. I had my husband put it together and he said it wasn't too bad to get all the cords into place. I will say if you don't have the item you are charging just right you will not get a good connection to the charger and it won't charge.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTWO1116

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stand is perfect by my bed everything is together. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I originally had bought a charging stand from the Apple store but how it was made with all the cord built in, once one cord got messed up the entire thing was useless. THIS stand however requires you to place each of your charging cords inside, which is perfect because you can replace the cord if anything ever goes wrong
customer_reviews.author: Crissy lott

customer_reviews.title: Cuatomer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: The metal used to build this is very solid and heavy... the problem is that you cannot set the charging cords as needed. Some units bring adjustment screws, but this does not have the screws or holes to set the cords as needed. Very frustrating. Some people use super glue to hold the cords as needed. I do not recommend this... Update: January 10, 2019.... OLEBR actually emailed me and offered a full refund and that is extremely important to me as a customer of their product... I will adjust to 5 stars... OLEBR answered numerous emails and offered suggestions but stood by their product and refunded me... please consider this when purchasing this product...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the easy use of this product and the multifunction and organizational capacity it contains. It’s very sleek looking and I like that hubby and I can have different colors. Only thing I don’t like (but not the fault of the product or manufacturer just a fact...) is that on an ihome when phone is docked it automatically puts notifications on vibrate and only calls come through. Obviously with this it’s just using a regular charger and doesn’t have that option ... BUT!!! Again that’s my quirk, not the product! This is very nice and the price was GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: mnsgardner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift, and my friend cannot stop raving about it. She's a neat-nik and hated all the chaos of having her phone, watch and pods strewn on her tabletop. To add to my satisfaction of this product, I had a few questions so I emailed the proprietor (which was super EZ b/c the email address is right on the box!) Her response was friendly, prompt and very thorough. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Funderburk Books & Such

customer_reviews.title: Apple CHARGING STATION
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice for the price. The only issue is that when I go grab my phone from the charging station, sometimes the cord comes with it. I have to carefully detach the phone from the plug that way the cord stays in place. Same goes with the earbuds. The watch is perfect. If the base could be a little heavier that would be great, this way it does not move around the night stand that much. Overall, its a nice product for the money but you just have to be patience and use both hands to remove the phone and earbuds from the charging station.
customer_reviews.author: JER

customer_reviews.title: When you need your phone and it's Acessories all in one place.. this is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, she has a knack for leaving her phone downstairs and her watch upstairs or vice-versa. I thought it was pricey at first, but when I got it out of the pack and started to assemble it.. I realized that the price was actually much less than should be. This charging station is weighted, to keep cables in place and have embedded cable management, I absolutely love his well the cables are hidden underneath. No sliding and moving around when plugging/unplugging devices... Wish I had of found this before Christmas, would have been a great stocking stuffer.. but hey... better late than never..
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I literally have zero complaints about this product EXCEPT for that tiny gap shown in my pictures. I'm pretty anal about details like this and it irks me the product photos show a nice seal and it's actually like this. They nailed every other detail, why couldn't they nail this? Or at least reflect it correctly in the description. That aside, this thing feels premium, looks premium and is almost perfect. A-
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This stand is sturdy and heavy. It’s of great quality and a excellent way to keep apple devices organized. Everything is adjustable meaning you make the charging cables at tight or lose as you want to connect to your devices. Also, if you do have a case on your phone like I do, all you have to do is adjust the stand to accommodate your case. It’s really worth the money and I’m glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: K W.

customer_reviews.title: Screw doesn’t fit to secure Apple Watch stand
customer_reviews.text: The screw to secure the Apple Watch stand in the back does not fit. It is too short and won’t twist all the way down like it did on the phone stand. Pretty disappointing. Other than that easy to assemble but that problems needs to be acknowledged. No one else seems to have that trouble but we have and we tried several different things. Ended up trying to secure it with tape. Was tempted to return and hopefully get a better one back but didn’t want the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, clean and very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This charging base is extremely nice and very well made. It was very easy to run the wires and set it up. As you can see in the photo, all of my Apple devices fit nicely and they are all firmly held in each spot. One bit of advice is to make sure that you use the original Apple USB charging cables because if you try to use an aftermarket cable the lightning end will be too large to fit through the holes. Overall I am extremely happy with this product and would recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: White6!

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that it was easy to put the cables in and it looks great. What I did not like was that it is a little awkward to pack for trips due to the shape. Just got to pack socks and small stuff around it so that it does not break. Cannot unassemble this product. The 2 extra usb ports are a plus. Overall it is very convenient to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: RMA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I would always forget to charge my Apple Watch. Therefore I hardly ever wore it. Which would irritate me, Apple Watch kinda expensive. So bought this with the hope of keeping me organized. And yes! This did the trick. I charge my phone, Apple Watch and AirPods over night. Before I leave to work I know to grab my phone, watch and pods, they are all in the same spot! Super easy to assemble. I had to buy another for my husband and he loves it too. You do have to use original cables, luckily we still had all of ours. I love it! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Herrero

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a good setup. I like almost everything about this. Very nice and sturdy frame wise. The only thing I can suggest and I didn’t knock a star because of it is to make the lightning cables where you plug in more flush. IMO they sit a little to high and make it so that the phone and AirPods weight is what’s holding up the devices. If they were flush with the stand the weight of the devices wouldn’t be the only thing holding them up (to me it will ruin those cables faster). All in all it’s a good stand.
customer_reviews.author: Brent J Sauer

customer_reviews.title: recommend!
customer_reviews.text: You have to screw in the Apple Watch stand and they gave me the wrong screw had to go out and buy a new screw that will fit it. I have real apple cables and the tops pop out of the phone and the AirPod dock so the airpods don’t sit on the metal nether does the phone the cables are hard to get in. Update A nice lady named Amy contacted my phone number and asked me what she needed to do and she sent me the screws
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Organize your phone, watch and AirPods
customer_reviews.text: I missed that this was just a stand and didn’t come with charging cords so I was a little disappointed by that but it really is a great idea. I hate just laying my watch on my nightstand to charge at night. This stand allows me to easily see the time and its progress charging.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; few discrepencies
customer_reviews.text: Product is a reliable heavy duty charging stand. Has visual appeal. Main issues w/stand is the phone charging cord placement. It will not charge on some cases. The lighting end does not seat high enough to insert completely to charge. The air pod cord also unseats when pulling the pods on the charging base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “One to rule them all”
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with metal feeling Iphone, headphone and watch holder. I have all of three items and wanted a single product that could handle them all. This is it. Cheap, durable and good looking. Only sent problem is that when my AirPods have their case on, sometimes the grip is not the best
customer_reviews.author: CustomerO

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive, great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand when I purchased an apple watch and air pods. It's awesome to be able to just set all three on the stand and they are automatically plugged in with organized cables. The metal is heavy with a solid design.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped it would be! I read many review about many similar products before deciding on this product. I feel it is fairly priced as well. It has a good weight to it as it is a metal so it doesn't slide all over the place when I'm placing my devices or taking them out. It was easy to assemble and the wires fit securely underneath as purposed. I'm going to buy another as a gift! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: Must use original Apple cords for watch, AirPods and phone!
customer_reviews.text: Have to use original Apple cords with this. I tried my non Apple Watch charging cord in it and it won’t fit in the circular part that the watch sits on, so if you don’t have the original cords, it won’t fit. Have to get an original Apple Watch cord to see if that will fit. I hope it does! Will post an update.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong and Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable stand which is very strong and sits great on the nightstand. It is great for an organized look for you iPhone, AirPods and Watch. Groove Fits only work well with the ORIGINAL WHITE IPHONE CABLES, most of the more durable breaded cables will NOT FIT, all of your original cables should be used with this product. It has a very nice look that will add a mordern desk or nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Darrio McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Well made but doesn’t work with phone cases on
customer_reviews.text: The quality of The stand is exceptional! I was impressed putting all the pieces together and how they thought of everything. From where the wires go, to how the rubber fits my Apple Watch charger perfectly! The only downside is what I actually need it for. To charge my phone! I have a very thin phone case and from all the reviews and what I’ve seen it wasn’t a problem however when I put my phone down into the charger it pushes the cable down and it can’t grasp into my phone . Every time I use this I’d have to take off my cover. Thinking about returning
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great charging station!
customer_reviews.text: Stand is perfect. The material is metal which allows the charging station to hold up my phone and watch without the stand falling over. The only thing I did notice is when both are charging at night I hear a sound coming from the charging station. I take my phone off and the sound goes away. That’s a very small con to the charging station. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Updated version much improved.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company reached out to me and sent me an updated version to replace the original watch stand that broke. This stand is much more durable and feels more sturdy. I have had it for about two weeks and so far so good. Screws are holding tight. The company stood by their product and updated it and replaced the defective one. Original review: It feels like it should be durable but it isn’t well made. One of the screws were stripped right away and the other became that way in a couple months. It will not hold the watch or the phone now. Very disheartening to only get a couple months use of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👏🏽
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Purchased one for my husband as a gift (and also for myself as a gift) Considering purchasing more for travel since we’ve grown accustomed to the ease and don’t know how to live without them. They are also ideal for the office. Fairly easy to assemble. Sturdy. Aesthetically pleasing. Colors came in exactly as shown on the ad. (My favorite part) Base is Not bulky. It’s Light weight but sturdy. (How?) Overall, very pleased and impressed! Great gifts! - only thing: you cannot interchange iPhone charger with ipad. There isn’t enough space for the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Really love how sturdy this product is. Nice and heavy so it won’t fall over or anything like that. Wish you didn’t have to use a tone of cords, but other than that it is a great product! Would buy again/for a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but running cords underneath is hard.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions but seller website has a video. Comes with extra screws which I have no idea what it’s for. Running the cords underneath is a pain even with original cords. I had to dremel the groves to run the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Works great, a little trouble with iPhone plus case fitting
customer_reviews.text: I can not fit my phone with the case on the stand as directed. I have to pulled up the changer wire just a bit to have it fix so the phone does not fix perfectly. But everything else is awesome and fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: saves space
customer_reviews.text: if youre looking for a cheaper way to have your phone and watch on the same charging doc it is worth it! Keeps the cords in order and organized. Pretty heavy. And easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great cable organization station!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that does exactly what it says it does. You do have to provide your own cables which isn’t a problem. Costumer service is amazing! Overall very happy to be able to organize my cables for my phone, watch, and AirPods!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials. Very functional.
customer_reviews.text: This actually surprised me. Seeing it was made in China, I expected some kind of faux metal and poor construction. The opposite was true. The base is very heavy (👍) and the lightning wires basically snap into place and stay there. It’s asthetically pleasing and very functional. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Medina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for your Apple Watch and iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This product requires a bit of assembly but if I can manage it anyone can. The product takes up a small footprint and creates a nice space to easily charge both devices simultaneously. I recommend this product. I also like that it affords two USB ports for charging other devices
customer_reviews.author: Good Judge

customer_reviews.title: Great! With one caveat
customer_reviews.text: For the money it works perfectly and the design is heavy/sturdy so it won’t tip over when placed on a nightstand. My only complaint is the channels for organizing the lightning cables are slightly too tight. So if you are using any offbrand lighting cables they more than likely won’t fit. Apple cables fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very well
customer_reviews.text: This stand I would highly recommend anyone looking to purchase. You cant go wrong with this charging dock. Easy to install and break down, compact and small enough to pack on a business or vacation trip. Has some weight to it, preventing movement, like the size of the stand too. Cant think of anything wrong with this stand. Stop looking for any other stand, believe me this is it. Very pleased with this purchase and would recomend this product to a friend or family. This product gets 5/5 rating!
customer_reviews.author: pocoLB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 as gifts. One was defective from the start. One of the screws would not fit at all. The second one, after using the product 2 or 3 times, the screws kept coming loose. You have to constantly adjust the screws or the pieces wobble. The base is sturdy but that doesn't help since the pieces that hold the phone and watch don't hold up. I didn't find out until too late to return. Money down the drain! I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Review and buy at own risk ......If travel need extra cords
customer_reviews.text: So I originally gave this product three stars.....since I have been harassed via phone calls, text messages and email by the seller to change my review, so now they get 1 Star. Unbelievable.....literally every week since December and now it is end of March. This is not how you earn business. Original review: Bought for traveling spouse but problem is you have to hook up all your cords separately. Would have loved A product that had built in cords that consolidated to one plug. Not practiCal for traveling person unless you have extra lighting cords you can have hooked up At all times.
customer_reviews.author: Mjonesy

customer_reviews.title: Charging stand problem corrected
customer_reviews.text: The lightening connector for my iPhone did not insert deeply enough with the phone in it's case. The simple fix provided by Amy at OLEBR was to simply add a rubber band to the base of the lightening plug where it inserts into the case. I used nylon cord and it worked great. I think I'll be using this stand for many years to come. Just as importantly, Amy got back to me within 24 hours to solve my problems. There was a small plastic bag with two screws, one plug, and one cable management tie. See attached photo. I'm really pleased with my charging stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this since we want to put phone and iwatch togethe. It is great this product can charge three products at one time! ( phone, watch, AirPods) of course, it is easy to put all parts together. Less than one minute. I like this dock a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: 3 cables
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. Truly. My only gripe (a weak one at that) is that if you're using everything you'll have 3 cable sticking out of the back. But I realize thats not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great if you have all 3, even if you just had 2 of the 3 (IPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch), I love it! It does make it so that you cannot watch tv or movies, while charging your phone because of the positioning, but other than that a great product to have. I do wish they had suggested having a 3 way charging port though, it should’ve been self explanatory but I didn’t think about that!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Utley

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Amazon for years now and I’m currently a student prime member. After so many purchases, I have never come across an item as horrible as this one. Unlike the picture shown or the product description, this stand is just a stand. It has absolutely no charging functionality whatsoever and is solely for decorative purposes. If that weren’t enough, it also comes in pieces and is an absolute nightmare to try to put together. Don’t waste your time honestly. It was a quick return back for me. Thank you, next.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: The stand has enough spots to charge your Apple devices, but is one short
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully crafted device. Amazon should tell you the cables you need. If you have four devices you will need a four port usb plug to accommodate everything. The four devices my wife has is an iPhone, iPad, Watch and AirPods. I would recommend this station.
customer_reviews.author: jharrison

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: First off - you have to supply your own cables and the wireless charger for the Watch. I knew that after reading but at this price point you're approaching stands that include the plugs for phone or multi-Qi surfaces for charging wirelessly. Secondly - the machining on the pathways for the wire is not finished well. It has several sharp edges that will cut away at the charging cables as you install, even at the risk of reducing insulation and exposing wire. I drew blood during installation of one of my cables - it's that sharp. Once it's setup - it's a really handy all-in-one charging point for the nightstand/desk/etc.. Attractive, compact and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stand. I originally had one for my iPhone X and Apple Watch. I recently purchased a pair of AirPods so I needed to upgrade my stand. I’ve been using this for a few weeks and I couldn’t be happier. The components are made of metal and are very sturdy. Having this dock reduces the clutter on my nightstand, makes cord management a breeze and looks great. I love having all three of my Apple products on the same dock because it reduces the chances of me forgetting to grab them. Will definitely recommend this product to others and will be purchasing additional docks for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stand for Apple devices. The color is accurate and it’s easy to put together. So it would be good for someone who travels and would like to toss it in their check-in bag. Remember, it’s just a stand and it doesn’t come with the charging cables. It’s nice though and worth the money. I plan on purchasing another for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Deese

customer_reviews.title: Nice material quality and perfect product to reduce wires on your night stand.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my husband’s night stand and we love it. It has a perfect size to have your phone, watch and AirPods together in the same place. I really love the fact that I don’t need different charges on my night stand anymore. I’m able to charge three different products without seeing the wires. The material seems durable and we are really happy with the product. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Charging Stand
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this stand as a gift and found it to be the perfect present. The quality is top notch and it was easy to assemble. The Apple cables fit perfectly into the channels on the bottom of the stand and the iPhone, Air Pods and Apple Watch look great mounted on the stand. I like the fact it is made out of aluminum which adds to it's durability. I highly recommend this stand!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This went together easily and I use it every night, very happy with it, my cords are no longer in the way, just make sure you have three apple cords (off market cord I had wouldn't fit the opening.)
customer_reviews.author: Loves Fiction

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box to my pieces of the product all over the place in addition to no instructions. I must have gotten the “returns” product. So I had to figure out how to assemble the product and I realized you will need 3 chargers to charge all 3 devices. It works but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela W.

customer_reviews.title: Used for about a week then stopped
customer_reviews.text: It is high quality. Thick metal. Sturdy. But doesn’t hold the wires perfectly so you can of have to pick up the stand and hold the wire to get it to plug in properly and then it like knocks everything out of position. I used it for like a week and then went nah, not for me. May work for others who don’t feel the need to check their phones every time it bUzzes, but’s it’s not easy to plug and unplug things. Perfect if you just plug it in and don’t touch it for the rest of the night
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Odenthal

customer_reviews.title: a cute set up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set up if you have an AirPod, Apple Watch, and an iPhone as most of us usually have if you’re a massive Apple fan. It takes a little time to set up the wires - but also a nice touch is that the wires get hidden and you can be organized without the wire mess. The material isn’t cheap feeling and provides good support. One issue is that if you have a bulky phone case that it may not fit as easily but it’s manageable!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Get you some apple charge cables.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. All devices in one place. You do have to have your own cords and I would suggest apple cords only. It’s literally made so precise that most other cord connectors will not fit into the products machined connection holders.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Faris

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title give the impression of wireless charging.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage, misleading title and picture give the impression that item is wireless. This smoke and mirrors game is old. Anyone else duped by this gimmick? I wonder if the FTC sees this as an issue with so many false and misleading products featured on Amazon. Because of this i have am have found that best buy offers much better descriptions. Do not buy tech on Amazon without a close inspection of all the written specs ect. very very shady amazon time. Everything from A to Z but the C(consumer) gets the short end. Not Happy, time to make a Youtube Video about these issues to see who else is getting fed up with sub par products.
customer_reviews.author: Edit Profile

customer_reviews.title: A well designed product
customer_reviews.text: Brought a new phone and an I watch this thanksgiving was worry about all the wires but I found this charging station. It’s great as it hides all the wires and the station is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Tien

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is poor quality and not what it claims to be. The iWatch portion of the stand has a cheap rubber insert that does not stay in place therefore your watch doesn’t charge. Instead it falls off. The wires get tangled (which is the whole reason I purchased this item). Don’t spend hour money on this. Too bad it’s to late to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: LilLucy

customer_reviews.title: It didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute, but the cable for the iphone needed to be pulled out and plugged into the phone before I set my phone down. If i just put the phone over the cable in the slot it would just push the cable down and not click into the phone with force to start charging. I tried it various ways and the same thing always happened. I didnt give it a 1 star because it does look durable and if you dont mind fidgeting with the cable each time, then it looks cute and works well.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a near charger. Price was ok but once you buy the charging cables it’s alil pricey but seems well built. Shipping was 2 days late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the form factor of this stand. The stand does not hold the phone charger in place well, though. I have to hold the charger in place and plug the phone in at the some time. Don't know what it's not working correctly, but I still like the stand.
customer_reviews.author: SatsumaSada

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It extremely sturdy and nice design. A couple of cons: - doesn't come with cables and it only fits original sized cables (sturdier woven cables don't fit through the openings) - you still need a 3 usb port adapter for you outlet
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia Cirjan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps tech organized
customer_reviews.text: This dock is great! I ordered a different one prior to trying this one out and the previous one did not work because the cable slots were way too small. I found this option and decided to give it a try and needless to say, the cables fit through perfectly and it was very easy to assemble! I'm extremely happy with how organized it keeps my phone, airpods and iwatch plus it brings a cable tie witch keeps the cables together at the end. My only comment would be to make the airpods piece a little bigger so one can keep the case on when charging.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ginebra

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it was a great deal compared to the AppleTM charging stand. Much more affordable. However, you should be aware that it's hard to use anything other than Apple brand charging cables as the insert holes are designed for the Apple ones. I tried to use matching pink cables and had to return them because they wouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Everything sits perfectly and the cable management at the bottom is wonderful. However the new lightning cable for the IPhone 11 pro max doesn’t fit its designated space. It is too “chubby”. I had to use the cable from an older model and since the other end of the new cable is USBc I also couldn’t use the original charger for the 11 pro max. The seller reached out to me and was super nice. Gave me an upgrade for a charger compatible for the IPhone 11 pro max.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Fits pro beats also!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! Took me a little while to put together but not hard at all. I was a little hesitant because all of the photos had ear pods and I have pro beats. The case for beats is a lot bigger and I wasn’t sure it would fit. It fits! (See pic) I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R.

customer_reviews.title: Still too many cords
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I bought it in hopes to reduce cords being plugged into the outlet. This didn’t solve that problem, still had to plug in 3 cords (phone, watch, AirPods). I was hoping this stand would have a power cord to plug into the wall and possibly a few USB ports to plug other electronics into if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: No power cords included.
customer_reviews.text: A very nicely machined stand. You have to supply the cords. That could be a positive (think cord failure). The negative is three cord coming from this to the three port USB adapter I had to buy. Twisted my cords for a cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: A necessary stand for convenience
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself for my office. It's exactly as pictured, has a decent bit of weight to it and a rubberized/felt bottom to prevent it from sliding around. I bought two different models of this from this company - both are extremely safe bets and definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use with case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy charger. Did not like the phone part of the charging, like the other reviews it is hard with a case on it. You end up braking the cord. What was the most disappointing was one of the screws was not put in right and the head of the screw was stripped. When I asked for a replacement screw they asked for pictures before they would replace it. Working 70 weeks I did not have the energy to mess with it so I just bought 2 from another company that I like 10 times more as the device lays on the side and I have room for 6 devices for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: wanda wunderlich

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sleek look and durable. Wish it worked with cases
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! We really wanted it to work for us, but it didn’t work with our AirPod case and phone case. It was exactly what we wanted and we loved the durability and look of the product but unfortunately it just didn’t work out for us. If this seller sold it where it was more compatible with common phone/AirPod cases, we would definitely purchase that one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have AirPods, but wanted to organize my Chargers a little better. The watch station in the BEST! It doesn’t COMPLETELY fit with the pop socket, but it certainly is manageable. Easy to put together and super convenient! Nicely designed!
customer_reviews.author: Ballerina Girl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT charger! Keeps everything neat and organized!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this charger! Keeps my watch securely placed on the charger it doesn’t fall off middle of the night, secure place for my AirPods, and my phone. I usually charge my iPhone with my mophi charger which doesn’t work on this but it’s all good! I use my laptop/iPad charger valet to separately charge my Mophi so I have my iPhone completely charger, Mophi,laptop etc! LOVE the color too and I can easily take it traveling with me too by removing the two screws and it folds up easily!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I purchased a multiple USB wall plug along with it and I no longer have to plug my different devises into different chargers all over the house. I can’t believe I’ve gone this long with out it! I highly recommend💕
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my hubby who likes things organized. He loves this stand! It looks great at his bedside and keeps everything tidy. The stand has a nice weight and seems to be a great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The station worked fine. An customer service is amazing. Had an issue with getting another one an Amy was very helpful an solved the problem very fast. She kept in contact an made sure everything was taken care of. Will do business again with her. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if you didn’t have a phone or AirPods case. Yes you are able to adjust the phone holder but if you have a case on it you can’t get it to plug into your phone. Also, you can’t plug in your AirPods if you have a case. Will be returning and looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica ray

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE OLBER made it right: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Update: OLEBR made it right, love that they take care of their customers, so often most don’t, thanks!! This is on my table, the phone and EarPods works well but the rubber around the I watch charger is flimsy and pops out easily, will keep but is can be a pain in the butt. The over all look is nice!
customer_reviews.author: di2015

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this product was a charging device, it’s not I have to supply my own charging cables for each of my three devices. All this does is hold the devices while they charge. Sort of like the many tables I have around the house that do the very same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Connor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Chinese Made Plastic Garbage
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? It was easy enough to assemble, but required three cables (no splitter) wasn't very well balanced, included some paper for a scam they were running, and was overall just junk. If you're going to go for this sort of appliance, just bite the bullet and spend the $100 or so on a decent one. The junk version is not worth it in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One star off because I have to take case off cell phone each time to charge there’s not room to charge with case on cell phone 🥺
customer_reviews.author: H. Luvjoy

customer_reviews.title: holds all the electronics
customer_reviews.text: kind of a pain needed to have all three cords tied up, but if you have extra charging cables, this works great
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent! It’s worth the few extra pennies for a great product. The only down side is the way it kinks the charging cords. I’m already planning on replacing them frequently but haven’t yet had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mental Floss

customer_reviews.title: Not a wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not looking in to this product a little closer before ordering. Really nice heavy aluminum stand but you must supply 3 lightning chargers. I’m returning as I wanted wireless for the phone and watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jayloe

customer_reviews.title: Organized nightstand now!
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my cords and nightstand organized much better! Great product for all three of my rechargeable devices.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE my prime!

customer_reviews.title: Good gadget thingy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat. I like aluminum and it’s sturdy. I would not take this traveling because it’s not something I would breakdown and put together each trip, unless it was an extended thing. It’s cool, maybe a little pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My gf wanted this for her apple products. She's hardly used it but it is made well. Solid metal and good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not What I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: The cable ends keep slipping down into the base every time I try to dock my phone- doesn’t allow for using non-apple cables (or EXACT size), have to have 3 plugs open since it doesn’t combine the power source, not easy to assemble, and nothing stays in the troughs at the bottom. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple product makes the night stand look so much less cluttered. I think i’d like to try a silicone one to compare because the five might make plugging in or moving the charger easier But great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: You hook up your own chargers through individual holes. Does not fit your phone with a case on it. I tried supergluing it into place and it still wouldn’t hold a charge. Not worth the asking price. Should have returned it. Really upset at the fact I paid nearly fourty dollars for something to just hold my cords. Or attemp to.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Brighton

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use every brand charging cord.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint it that not every iPhone charger can be used with this stand. The slot that the lightning cable connects to is very narrow. So far only the Apple brand cord has fit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Court

customer_reviews.title: Its fine
customer_reviews.text: I only need the watch and the phone plug, if you do not have skinny enough plugs it will not set up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: No USB charger or Q charging. Pass on it
customer_reviews.text: The unit does NOT come with a three port usb charger as shown. The length of the phone back is too short and will break shortly. You must use all your original cables. No induction Q charger. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Completely Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product expecting a stand that would actually charge my devices. It doesn’t. This stand is a $40 holder for the devices and you still need the cables. Extremely frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: angela mobley

customer_reviews.title: Cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: No more, searching for multiple wall sockets!!!! Instead of tossing my phone down on random tables every night, this stand can cradle it with a little more care and all in one spot. also great for watching videos on my phone late at night... hands free of course. Great purchase 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Althea Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Shows nice
customer_reviews.text: These stands look great and work perfectly. Made solid. You have to use OEM cords, but that is fine with us. If you have an apple watch, iPhone and Air Pods, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Foerster

customer_reviews.title: Great way to charge everything in one place!!
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for a way to get rid of all the cords on the nightstand to charge my phone and my watch and get rid of the clutter. This worked perfectly even after upgrading my phone and watch to the new series!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this item collapses for travel but hate that all the apple products have to use their cords with this. I was hoping the power to the unit would be a single cord that came with the stand but that is probably why it isn’t as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in COS

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy & slip Free
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of all my stuff just being all over my nightstand. I honestly saw this on Facebook and was like I need that. After reading a few good reviews I hit “buy now” so glad I did super sturdy My cords tucked away and now my watch sits and charges without falling on the floor or getting scratched
customer_reviews.author: Inkdcaligirl

customer_reviews.title: Great stand and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is fantastic, it served my iPhone Xs Max, Airpods and Series 4 Watch well. When I got my new phone, unfortunately the cable was too big for the iPhone 11 Pro Max. I contacted their customer service and they worked out a solution to get me going again. Highly recommended stand!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

product_meta.title: OLEBR Charging Stand Compatible with iWatch 5 and 4 Watch Charging Stand for AirPods, iWatch Series 5/4/3/2/1,iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs/X Max/XR/X/8/8Plus/7/7 Plus /6S /6S Plus/iPad-Space Gray
feature_bullets: 【PREVENT iWATCH FROM FALLING OFF】Patented silicone tray steadily holds iWatch 45 Degree with Nightstand Mode for time viewing or alarm while prevented from falling off or scratching. Fits for 40mm & 44mm of iWatch Series 5 and Series 4, also fits both 38mm & 42mm of iWatch Series 3/2/1.

【Compatible with iPhone CHARGING】Showcases your device for sturdy, hands-free interaction like Face Time or Skype, Compatible with iPhone with different slim cases. “Innovative three pebbles design” allows the phone to be placed horizontally without scratching the edge of the phone or blocking the contents on the screen, especially when using a full-screen phone.

【AS Airpods STAND】Ancient sycee-shaped design makes its more than a stand but A Luxury which has a collection value to match well with Airpods in a stable and elegant manner, it is the combination of Chinese culture and Western culture.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】1> Unscrew TWO big screws in the back 2> Assemble iwatch magnetic charger from top to bottom through the stand 3> Assemble cables for iPhone and Airpords from bottom to top through the stand.

【COMPATIBILITY】Compatible with original iPhone Charging cable and new AmazonBasics cable (3 feet) with the same size of the original iphone Charging connector (cannot guarantee 100% applicable for all AmazonBasics cables; if your cable doesn’t fit the slot well, please use original iphone one). ATTN: IPHONE,iWATCH, AIRPODS, CHARGING CABLE, AND iWatch MAGNETIC CHARGER SHOWN IN IMAGES ARE FOR USAGE DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES ONLY AND ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH THIS PRODUCT.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,303 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
